sentences.en: And desire not to devour all things which you see around you.
sentences.cn: 不要想着把你周边的东西都狼吞虎咽掉.

sentences.en: Finally, making a dreadful mess, they devour the fruit.
sentences.cn: 最后，他们狼吞虎咽地吃起了水果，果汁滴得到处都是。

sentences.en: Go, gather all the beasts of the field; Bring them to devour.
sentences.cn: 你们去聚集田野的百兽, 带来吞吃罢.

sentences.en: Her body had been almost entirely devoured by the disease.
sentences.cn: 她的身体几乎完全被疾病摧毁。

sentences.en: I tried to devour my repentance and disgust in secret.
sentences.cn: 我竭力暗自吞咽我的后悔和憎恨.

sentences.en: Insects would make it impossible for us to live in the world; they would devour all our crops and kill our flocks and herds , if it were not for the protection we get from insect - eating animals.
sentences.cn: 昆虫会使我们无法在这个世界上生存: 如果不是由于食虫动物的 保

sentences.en: Larger fish devour the smaller ones.
Nor could she devour them by any escapade of a less legitimate description.
sentences.cn: 她也不能通过任何不大合法的自由放荡行为来吞没他们.

sentences.en: Open thy doors, O Lebanon, that the fire may devour thy cedars.
sentences.cn: 1黎巴嫩哪, 开开你的门, 任火烧灭你的香柏树.

sentences.en: Some remove the landmarks ; They seize and devour flocks.
sentences.cn: 伯24:2有人挪移 地界 、夺群畜而牧养.

sentences.en: Sometimes they burrow through the cheeks and devour the tongue.'
sentences.cn: 有时它们先咬面颊,再吃舌头. ”

sentences.en: The adversary went about seeking whomever he might devour.
sentences.cn: 魔鬼四处寻找可噬的人.

sentences.en: The big fish continued to devour the little ones.
sentences.cn: 那条大鱼继续吞吃小鱼.
男孩子们狼吞虎咽地把薄煎饼吃了。

sentences.en: The highest power. In lonely hours. The tears devour you.
sentences.cn: 爱的力量之中. 哪怕孤寂时, 这眼泪曾经吞噬你我.

sentences.en: We would not necessarily be drawn into a campaign that would continuously devour valuable resources.
sentences.cn: 我们没必要牵入一种不断消耗有价值资源之战争.

sentences.en: You devour widows houses and for a show make lengthy prayers.
sentences.cn: 因为你们侵吞寡妇的家产,假意作很长的祷告,所以要受更重的刑罚.

trans.tran_cn: 狼吞虎咽地吃，如饥似渴地读，吞噬
trans.tran_en: to eat something quickly because you are very hungry

trans.tran_cn: 狼吞虎咽地吃， 吞食； 吞没， 吞噬； 如饥似渴地读
trans.tran_en: to eat something quickly because you are very hungry
